subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi Bruce,

interesting recording, also regarding its length.

What I noticed is that I mainly get English messages when I use the
SpeakJet file with EVPmaker. (I usually get German EVPs, since this is
my native language.) Probably the reason is that SpeakJet is especially
designed to synthesize English speech.

Stefan

--
